title: Jüicy Legööchy with Jockum Hallin
description:
Get ready for the next great link up as Throwing Fits goes absolutely glow skull mode (this will hopefully make more sense later) with founder, chairman and owner of Our Legacy, Jockum Hallin. The boys are dialing in The Joker for an international podcast spanning both an ocean and a variety of topics including, but not limited to: the collaboration of the year aka Stüssy x Our Legacy, wearing boxers, Stockholm taste lords, the art of upcycling, the childhood trauma of all your coolest T-shirts getting stolen, opportunities for retail growth in a post-COVID world and much more on this humble and plush episode of The Only Podcast That Matters™.
 
Throwing Fits x Grailed: https://grailed.app.link/tf
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits
